charges.charge_description: 21:952(a), 960(a)(1) &; 960(b)(1)(A); 18:3551 et seq-IMPORTATION OF HEROIN, A SCH I NARCOTIC DRUG CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 18 months imprisonment, followed by 3 years supervised release. Special assessment: $50.00. Fine is waived. Remaining counts are dismissed on govt's motion. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(A)(i); 18:3551 et seq-POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE HEROIN, A SCH I NARCOTIC DRUG CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE. (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on motion of the United States. (2)

charges.charge_description: 21:9529 (a)(1) &; 960; Deft did knowingly and unlawfully import into the United States from a place outside a substance containing heroin. [1:94-m-1401]
